tweets.text: 2.5 miles away from this Hell Hole, that looks like a monster and smells like the Devil's Breath .. How did anyone ever at any stage, sanction ANY of this? @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @MPGeorgeEustice @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/2K0qcDknCb
@DrMickSalt @EnvAgencyMids Thank you for the updates and information. Still curious as to what actions led to the sudden escalation of H2S production and release.
I am hearing that @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest may have finally seen sense!? @ChrisGPackham @Natures_Voice @DevonWildlife https://t.co/fAB6uuBlCW

@a_merrydew @DrMickSalt @EnvAgencyMids I‚Äôm appalled at that news! Removing monitoring due to cuts?! Won‚Äôt take action due to costs?! What on earth is going on @AaronBell4NUL . This is wholly unacceptable, people are being tormented in their own homes. This better not be the post election flee. Deadlines need to be set

@Regenerate_SOT @DrMickSalt @EnvAgencyMids @AaronBell4NUL The link isn't working for me but I'm even more worried now (if that's possible). @AaronBell4NUL told us to expect positive news yesterday and now your tweet suggests the opposite to be true... Would you mind sharing a working link/screenshots so I can read the meeting summary?

Summary of meeting with the @EnvAgencyMids on Monday 10th May 2021 to discuss permanent #StopTheStink monitoring solutions for Walleys Quarry Landfill. Too many characters to fit here, so please read here instead: https://t.co/OcXAbgpPoU

tweets.text: Three months ago @EnvAgency began receiving thousands of complaints about #AirPollution from Whalley's quarry landfill. They checked for odour last weekend. Found it. And yet today the landfill started taking waste again. When will you take action? #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe https://t.co/EbNfU5Bq8y
@AaronBell4NUL @JournoJess_ @EnvAgencyMids Time for solutions @EnvAgencyMids     Not weasel words, wrist-slapping, stalling, gaslighting and dragging it out til Dec 26.  Solutions please, now please.

Well said!! @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA also to any media outlets that use the phrase ‚Äòstinkiest town‚Äô or ‚Äòsmelly‚Äô please replace with ‚Äòodour from poisonous gas‚Äô. please don‚Äôt trivialise it by saying it‚Äôs a smell. The poisonous gas smells. K. Cool. üëçüèΩ https://t.co/qVtEy6wxES

We can now see it‚Äôs not the @EnvAgency being scared of an orphaned site , they‚Äôre scared of footing the bill to restore it . It‚Äôs a case of The EA with no money , red with no interest and us in the middle with no quality of life . @StinkStopthe

@BenM_Anderson @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off @MPGeorgeEustice The cost to health is worth it!

Silverdale has seen a tide of pollution over the last 7 months  &  its going to get worse!

It's now take take take & destroy our Greenbelt that has given us Village status, it comes down to nothing but greed!

Health will suffer costing millions!

Delighted the government today confirmed it will take forward principles of my Private Members Bill to start to #EndSewagePollution, by introducing Govt amendments to the Environment Bill. https://t.co/W9WgZZy7m4 https://t.co/HxMiVgdL02

tweets.text: Exceptionally good article from @JournoJess_ @guardian Thanks for coming to Newcastle under Lyme& reporting on this ongoing environmental disaster, health emergency& suffering locals at the end of their tether  @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @EnvAgency @MattHancock @PHE_EoEngland https://t.co/aYAgG82lx8

tweets.text:
Thank you @JournoJess_ for the latest national coverage of our environmental & public health disaster. Time for stronger action from @EnvAgencyMids 

‚ÄòIt‚Äôs terrifying‚Äô: the English village overwhelmed by landfill stink
 https://t.co/t0lmMUCzx6

It‚Äôs been a long and difficult 24 hours... #CSIoftheSea examination on the Thames minke whale about to get underway with @OfficialZSL and @ZSLScience team, great collective effort by many in helping with the recovery. More to follow https://t.co/7fw5aTftKE

@AaronBell4NUL @JournoJess_ @EnvAgencyMids The smell in Silverdale at Silverdale Road traffic lights right now is absolutely disgusting. Foul acrid nauseous stench emanating from Walleys landfill Newcastle Staffs.  Disgraceful situation

tweets.text: @MrMarkwarren1 @SianieRoo @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @Cap_it_off @MPGeorgeEustice More money for environmental regulation and enforcement so that they can actually monitor things and do due diligence?

The @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA definitely need more money, they‚Äôre saying they‚Äôve no money to monitor the landfill longer term - we‚Äôve not even solved the fumes yet so this is v v concerning! I don‚Äôt buy the due diligence tho, he was already known to them @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/O0evVeHSDu

Our Cumbria & Lancashire Field teams are inspecting tidal doors this week. Today, at Dragley Beck in #Cumbria we made sure the doors were operating correctly ‚Äì any kind of blockage could increase the risk of #flooding to properties upstream in Ulverston #TeamEA #ReducingFloodRisk https://t.co/rNpc41oaBK

tweets.text: Thank you @JournoJess_ @guardian @guardiannews for telling our story with care + concern This is an @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids Crisis and we fear it will be too late before anything is done @SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA #lestwedie #stopthestink https://t.co/XFzXt3AktT

tweets.text: Sending my love to the 1000s of people in Staffordshire who are in for yet another night of sleep deprivation & stress caused by Walley's Quarry landfill. As usual, the odour is so strong that it's gotten into the house. Time to hold my breath for the next 10 hours #StopTheStink

Keep the Sowe Buzzing. just adding the final touch to the wildflower meadow, an information poster plus a memorial plaque for a former member of "The friends of Sowe Valley" @coventrycc @KeepBritainTidy @stwater @CRTWestMidlands @EnvAgency https://t.co/TchDDa0TPp

@AaronBell4NUL @JournoJess_ @EnvAgencyMids Time for stronger, faster action with outcomes that work , not wild goose chases to fob off residents whilst stalling to 2026 & inflicting misery & poor health on 1000s #stopthestink
@SOPH_C_ Ironically their website link doesn't work.

@SFRS_cjackson @bbcmtd @BBCShropshire @shropsfire @BBCNews @TelfordWrekin Thanks to all our @shropsfire staff and partner agencies  who are supporting this incident. Great progress being made but still some work to do. @TelfordWrekin @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_WestMids @SFRS_Chief

@AaronBell4NUL @MattHancock @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids @OrlaithiF_MLA  @PaulMaskeyMP @danielbakersf people of Newcastle under Lyme have been suffering from landfill gas at #WalleysQuarry, the similarities with what's going on here with the #mullaghglass landfill site is shocking! #belfast #Lisburn

tweets.text: Well I am excited to announce 2021 Derwent tracking project tagging has officially finished with 150 salmon smolts tagged! Let hope we get some interesting data this year! @EnvAgencyNW @NECumbria @WestCumbriaRT @sceneUofG https://t.co/FT2FX4Yq83

tweets.text: @LFC_Jacqui @seftoncouncil @EnvAgencyNW The project is nearing completion and we remain  committed to working with local councillors & stakeholders to look at options as the work is completed. We'll update you on the outcome of these discussions as we return the area back to you. Thank you for bearing with us.
@masterton88 @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @StaffordshireCC @davemh72

UPDATE 19.00hrs 11/5/21 
Today‚Äôs update explains how we are progressing. Thank you for your patience and support. @bbcmtd @BBCShropshire @shropsfire @BBCNews @TelfordWrekin https://t.co/eKjf2Qoes2

tweets.text: @cherrybsboys @RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids Yes indeed! Get it capped and shut once & for all.

@RedIndustries2 The only information needed is that Walleys is too close to the population and is an environmental and health hazard, causing misery and harm to thousands of local residents. @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids

@Yorkshire_Grit @Yorkshire_Grit Hi, the tractor unit has already been recovered @EnvAgencyYNE and @CanalRiverTrust were made aware of the potential for pollutants yesterday evening and booms were put in place to mitigate this.
